settings.question: How does the Hotel Collection Diffuser work?
settings.answer: The Studio Scent Diffuser uses cold air diffusion, which ensures consistent and subtle scenting without any highs or lows. This type of advanced atomization technology is residue free and safe for pets, children, artwork and furniture.

settings.question: What about sensitivities to fragrances?
settings.answer: Hotel Collections oils are IFRA compliant meaning they are of the highest standards in the industry. Our oils are made from the finest plant-derived essences and pure essential oils and have anti-bacterial, antiviral, and antifungal properties. Our oils are safe to use around people, pets, or plants and are free of carcinogens.

settings.question: What is Cold Air Diffusion?
settings.answer: Cold air diffusion is the latest technology in the scenting industry. It works by using high amounts of cold filtered air combined with air pressure to diffuse oils into a dry mist of nanoparticles. Using no heat or water, this scenting technique preserves the therapeutic properties of our fragrance oils without altering their smell.

settings.question: Do Hotel Collection Fragrance Oils have health benefits?
settings.answer: Some fragrances can be aromatherapeutic and have both physical and mental health benefits, which you can read more about here.

settings.question: What features does the Hotel Collection Diffuser have?
settings.answer: The Studio Scent Diffuser offers customizable fragrance intensity and automatically turns off when the timer is up or oil runs out.

settings.question: How long will the oils last?
settings.answer: When used at the recommended settings of 4-8 hours/day an oil bottle will last approximately one month in a Hotel Collection Diffuser. The exact length of time will depend on the usage and fragrance concentration.

settings.question: What is a Hotel Collection Fragrance Oil?
settings.answer: Hotel Collection Fragrance Oils are a blend of therapeutic-grade essential oils and perfume-quality fragrance oils, designed to mimic the notes of your favorite hotel scents. They are designed to maintain all the therapeutic benefits of essential oils and provide maximum versatility and control of the scenting environment.

settings.question: Where should I store oils?
settings.answer: Never store fragrance oils in direct sunlight. Heat and light can deteriorate their quality and cause oil to evaporate. We encourage you to properly store oils in a dry, cool place.

settings.question: Are Hotel Collection Fragrance Oils safe?
settings.answer: All Hotel Collection oils are hypoallergenic, IFRA compliant and meet the highest safety standards in the industry. Our ingredients are of the highest quality and are cruelty-free; vegan; and safe for pets, children, artwork and furniture.

settings.question: These oils smell so great; can I use them on my skin?
settings.answer: Since our oils contain pure essential oils and plant essences, do not apply these oils topically as they are in pure, undiluted form. If you get oil on your hands, wash the area with soap and water.
